context: High Percentage of inbound calls are status inquiries

keyMoments.name: Stage 1
keyMoments.data: We are definitely interested in lowering call volumes, and want to discuss more

keyMoments.name: Stage 3
keyMoments.data: Management is concerned about our high call volume, as part of a margin improvement initiative

keyMoments.name: Stage 4
keyMoments.data: Our Pareto analysis shows that the biggest opportunity to reduce call volumes may be < 2 minute calls

comments.name: Jerome Mason
comments.comment: Hi @Dylan Sullivan, How did you collect the data for the Pareto Analysis?

comments.name: Stanley Banks
comments.comment: Great Story. @TeamATT, Lets look at replicating this deal.

comments.name: Jerome Mason
comments.comment: Hi @Dylan Sullivan, How did you collect the data for the Pareto Analysis?

comments.name: Stanley Banks
comments.comment: Great Story. @TeamATT, Lets look at replicating this deal.

proTipText: Ask for Pareto data on % of inbound calls that were resolved in 2 minutes or less. Those calls can be eliminated via our self-service solution and can help reduce costs.
